text: Lucas is a 1986 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by David Seltzer, It was released on March 28, 1986. The movie was a geared toward a teen audience. This movie ranked number 16 on Entertainment Weekly's list of the 50 Best High School Movies . ==Plot summary== The main character of the movie, Lucas is a shy and quiet, fourteen-year-old nerd, who is in love with a girl. This leads to heartbreak when his older friend and the girl fall in love. == Other websites == * Category:1986 comedy-drama movies Category:1986 romantic comedy movies Category:1986 romantic drama movies Category:1980s sports movies Category:1980s teen comedy movies Category:1980s teen drama movies Category:1980s teen romance movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:American teen drama movies Category:American teen romance movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Illinois Category:American sports comedy movies
title: Lucas (movie)
